title: TRP Trail EVO and Slate EVO get full EVO treatment for better, more affordable braking
content:
TRP has been steadily improving their brakes, and more riders are taking notice. At the high end, their DH-R EVO brakes have received excellent reviews for offering plenty of useable power. Now, that same EVO update is being applied to their Trail and Slate brakes for more affordable brake systems with their best performance yet. [â€¦]
